about.tagline: Learn to Code, Grow Together, Conquer the Future! ðŸš€
about.shortIntro: We are the official campus body of GFG, helping students develop coding skills, prepare for competitions, and connect with the tech world.
about.vision: Building a strong coding culture in our college to prepare every student for the tech industry and connect them with industry experts
about.mission: Providing students with practical coding skills, competitive programming, interview preparation, and industry connections through hands-on workshops, real-world projects, and collaborative learning environment
about.history: Our GeeksforGeeks Campus Body was established in September 2024. What initially started with 20 enthusiastic students has now grown into a strong community of 500+ active members. Our chapter's goal is to make every student successful in the coding field and provide them with industry-ready skills.
whatWeDo: Weekly Coding Workshops (DSA, Web Dev, Mobile Dev)
Competitive Programming Sessions and Contest Training
Technical Interview Preparation and Mock Interviews
Industry Expert Guest Lectures and Mentorship
Career Guidance and Resume Building Workshops

team.name: Ankit Raj
team.description: Leading the chapter with a passion for competitive programming and community building. Spearheading initiatives to connect students with industry opportunities.

team.name: Aman Sharma
team.description: The backbone of our chapter, ensuring smooth execution of all activities and managing internal team coordination to bring our vision to life.

team.name: To Be Announced
team.description: We are looking for a passionate tech enthusiast to lead our technical domain, from workshops on cutting-edge technologies to competitive programming contests.

team.name: Nikhil
team.description: Mastermind behind our events, managing everything from planning and logistics to flawless on-ground execution. Ensures every event is a memorable experience.

team.name: Sagar Baghel
team.description: The creative soul of our chapter. Responsible for our brand's visual identity, from stunning social media posts to event banners and videos.

team.name: Ankit Yadav
team.description: The voice of our chapter. Building bridges with other communities, institutions, and media to amplify our reach and impact.

events.title: Web Development Bootcamp 2025
events.description: 3-day intensive bootcamp covering React, Node.js, MongoDB, and modern web development practices. Hands-on projects and real-world applications with industry experts.

events.title: AI/ML Workshop Series
events.description: Python, Machine Learning algorithms, and practical AI applications focused comprehensive workshop series.

events.title: CodeFest 2024 - Annual Hackathon
events.description: 24-hour coding marathon with industry mentors, exciting prizes worth 50K+, aur real-world problem solving challenges.

events.title: DSA Masterclass Series - Batch 2
events.description: Comprehensive Data Structures and Algorithms masterclass series with competitive programming focus and interview preparation.
events.outcome: 85% students showed significant improvement in problem-solving skills

events.title: Industry Expert Session - Google Engineer
events.description: Exclusive session with Google software engineer on 'Career in Tech Giants' and real industry insights.

speaker.name: Rahul Singh
speaker.experience: 5+ years at Google, Previously at Microsoft

events.title: Chapter Launch Event - GFG GITAM
events.description: Official launch event of GeeksforGeeks Campus Chapter at GITAM University with inaugural ceremony aur future roadmap presentation.
events.outcome: Successfully established chapter with 80+ founding members

achievements.title: Best Campus Chapter Award 2024
achievements.description: Officially recognized by GeeksforGeeks as the most active and impactful campus body in North India region for exceptional community building and student engagement.

achievements.title: CodeFest 2024 - Record Breaking Participation
achievements.description: Successfully organized our flagship hackathon with 85+ participants, 15 teams, and â‚¹50,000+ prize pool. Judging panel and live mentoring with industry experts.

achievements.title: Inter-College Hackathon Winners
achievements.description: Our campus body team members achieved first place in regional inter-college hackathon with innovative AI-powered campus management solution.
achievements.project: Smart Campus Management System using AI/ML

achievements.title: 500+ Member Milestone
achievements.description: Chapter membership crossed 500+ active students mark within 8 months of establishment, making it one of the fastest growing GFG Campus Bodies in India.

achievements.title: Industry Partnership Success
achievements.description: Successfully established partnerships with 5+ tech companies for placements, internships, aur guest lectures. 20+ students placed in top companies through chapter connections.

achievements.title: CodeChef Contest Champions
achievements.description: Multiple campus body members consistently ranking in top 100 of CodeChef monthly contests and representing college at national level competitions.

resources.title: DSA Complete Roadmap
resources.description: Step-by-step Data Structures and Algorithms roadmap specially designed for beginners with explanations and examples

resources.title: 100 Days of Interview Puzzles - Skill Up
resources.description: Get ready to conquer technical interviews with Skill Up - 100 Days of Interview Puzzlesa dynamic 100-day journey that sharpens your problem-solving skills, one puzzle at a time. Perfect for aspiring software engineers, data scientists, or anyone aiming to excel in high-stakes interviews, this course delivers daily challenges to keep you on your toes.

resources.title: Complete Machine Learning & Data Science - Nation Skill Up
resources.description: Complete Machine Learning & Data Science Program - With Python, Deep Learning is a structured, hands-on program designed to help learners build a solid foundation and expertise in the data science field. Covering everything from programming in Python to advanced deep learning techniques and reinforcement learning, this course provides end-to-end knowledge for aspiring data science students.

resources.title: Full Stack Web Development - Skill Up
resources.description: The Full Stack Web Development Program is a structured, hands-on course designed to help learners build responsive, dynamic, and scalable web applications from scratch. Covering everything from HTML5 and modular CSS architectures to asynchronous JavaScript, ES6+ standards, and modern frontend frameworks like React and TypeScript. On the backend, you'll architect RESTful APIs using Node.js and Express, integrate NoSQL databases with Mongoose and MongoDB.

resources.title: GFG Practice Portal
resources.description: Official GeeksforGeeks practice platform with curated problems, difficulty levels, aur detailed solutions

resources.title: Full-Stack Web Development Path
resources.description: Complete roadmap for modern web development covering React, Node.js, databases, deployment, aur industry tools

resources.title: Mobile App Development Guide
resources.description: React Native aur Flutter ke saath mobile app development ki complete guide with project-based learning

resources.title: Machine Learning Crash Course
resources.description: Python-based ML course with practical examples, real datasets, aur industry applications for beginners

resources.title: Open Source Contribution Guide
resources.description: GitHub aur open source contribution ki complete guide with project suggestions aur best practices

resources.title: Interview Preparation Toolkit
resources.description: Complete Interview preparation guide with company-wise questions, salary negotiations, aur career guidance

mentorship.description: 1-on-1 mentorship program with industry professionals and senior students

upcomingInitiatives.title: GFG Campus Ambassador Program
upcomingInitiatives.description: Training students to become official GFG campus ambassadors with special recognition aur perks

upcomingInitiatives.title: Industry Internship Drive
upcomingInitiatives.description: Exclusive internship opportunities with partner companies for chapter members

upcomingInitiatives.title: Open Source Contribution Month
upcomingInitiatives.description: Month-long program to encourage open source contributions with GitHub workshops aur project collaborations

upcomingInitiatives.title: Inter-Chapter Coding Championship
upcomingInitiatives.description: National level coding competition among all GFG campus chapters across India

testimonials.name: Ravi Kumar
testimonials.message: GFG Campus Body completely transformed my coding journey. Thanks to the DSA workshops and mock interviews, I got placed at Google!

testimonials.name: Ananya Singh
testimonials.message: The mentor I got through the campus body helped a lot with resume building and interview preparation. I got selected for Microsoft internship!

testimonials.name: Vikash Sharma
testimonials.message: After attending competitive programming sessions, my confidence level increased. I got top 10 rank in CodeChef contest!
